LanguageData.VFEE_TerribleBall.stages.0.label: terrible ball
LanguageData.VFEE_TerribleBall.stages.0.description: I'm embarrassed to be a part of that train wreck. I just hope no one gossips about this.
LanguageData.VFEE_BoringBall.stages.0.label: boring ball
LanguageData.VFEE_BoringBall.stages.0.description: I was expecting a grand time. What I got was seriously lacking.
LanguageData.VFEE_EnjoyableBall.stages.0.label: enjoyable ball
LanguageData.VFEE_EnjoyableBall.stages.0.description: I had a great time dancing in that ball!
LanguageData.VFEE_AmazingBall.stages.0.label: amazing ball
LanguageData.VFEE_AmazingBall.stages.0.description: I had such an amazing time at that ball. It was everything I imagined and more!
LanguageData.VFEE_TerribleExhibit.stages.0.label: terrible exhibit
LanguageData.VFEE_TerribleExhibit.stages.0.descriptio: I'm embarrassed that we hosted such a terrible art exhibit. Our art will never be resepected in the empire now!
LanguageData.VFEE_BoringExhibit.stages.0.label: boring exhibit
LanguageData.VFEE_BoringExhibit.stages.0.description: I was expecting a a lot more interesting pieces, and better presentation.
LanguageData.VFEE_EnjoyableExhibit.stages.0.label: enjoyable exhibit
LanguageData.VFEE_EnjoyableExhibit.stages.0.descripti: It was really interesting seeing our collection displayed like this. Was a great time!
LanguageData.VFEE_AmazingExhibit.stages.0.label: amazing exhibit
LanguageData.VFEE_AmazingExhibit.stages.0.description: I couldn't believe art I've seen many times could still be soo fascinating, and the royals were so interesting.
